ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Feeling kinda useless sometimes
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Grats on 29! ... I was in a great group last night.  I suppose it helped that we were all guildmates, but I d never fought with any of them before.  We (12
ygData.messageBody:
> Jacana Mourningsong
> Wood Elf of the 29th song (Woohoo level last night)
> <Crimson Dragons> Innoruuk

Grats on 29!

> they started to
> beat on the cleric instead. *LOL* He screams like a girl -
> ON ME ON ME.

I was in a great group last night. I suppose it helped that we were all
guildmates, but I'd never fought with any of them before. We (12 bard, 11
warrior, 14 cleric, 15 druid) were hunting around and on either side of the
Lavastorm/Najena zone line. In Lavastorm I was mixing
hymn/elemental/bellow, then hymn/anthem/bellow in Najena. For the most part
we had one mob at a time, but at one point the warrior pulled an ogre guard
& three large skeletons came with it. The skely's were blue to my so, with
lute equipped I started weaving hymn/CoD. My theory was that the warrior
could do a lot more damage to the ogre than me except that she was getting
stunned left & right by the skellys. Better for me to get stunned, right?
I no sooner pulled them off her when I hear on of my party scream "ON BARD
ON BARD" The cleric then proceeded to pull the skelly's off me. I've never
felt so loved! :-)

Heh, of course they completely defeating my purpose and extending the
fight....

Peace
Evulia, twink of twelve tunes, Tunare
